description:
For moms who want to stay active on the trail and introduce their child to nature. The Kid Comfort Active Carrier carries kids in comfort (for both passenger and parent) without adding extra weight. The women's specific SL ventilated back system lets air flow easily, and is shaped to fit women's bodies. Lots of pockets let you store everything you need for a full day outside.

  • Minimalist Lite Air System back panel connects directly to the frame for great load transfer
  • SL women's specific fit has slimmer, S-shaped shoulder straps that sit closer together and conical hip fins that snug to female hips
  • Vari-Quick back-length adjustment lets people of different heights carry the child
  • PullForward hip belt is easy to adjust, even with heavy loads
  • Perforated shoulder straps, load lifter straps and adjustable chest strap provide a comfortable fit
  • Height-adjustable child seat and foot rests can be adapated for growing kids
  • Colour coordinated child safety harness is easy to use
  • Child cockpit area has ventilated mesh sides, a detachable and washable chin pillow, soft fabric around the face and durable washable fabric by the feet
  • Sturdy aluminum frame is tip-resistant, has a locking base and folds for transport
  • Large mesh pocket under the child seat, large stretch front pocket and a zippered hip pocket
name: Deuter Kid Comfort Active SL Carrier - Infants
